item.title: Game Optimizations
item.description: * { box-sizing: border-box; } .video-container { float: left; width: 50%; padding: 2px; } .clearfix::after { content: ""; clear: both; display: table; } .center { display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; max-width: 50%; } video { width: 95%; height: auto; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; } The client’s new requirements added numerous game entities, drastically impacting the game’s performance. In this context, for four months, I focused on investigating and fixing performance bottlenecks, improving the game’s scalability, and bringing its performance to acceptable levels again.
